content:
Hi,
We created our IG in Trifolia and get the following error in the QA tab. Seems like it's something that need to be fixed in the IG publisher.

The extension http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/structuredefinition-normative-version is not allowed to be used at this point (allowed = e:StructureDefinition; this element is [[StructureDefinition.differential.element, BackboneElement.element, ElementDefinition])

Thank you.
it's something that needs to be fixed in the core specification
just proposed to filter this error in the Validator until R4.0.2 will be released: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179177-conformance/topic/structuredefinition-normative-version.20errors
